column5: i have a cabin in minaki the walleye fishing is great in big sand lake and the winnipeg river. and for those who like smallmouth fishing there are lots of smaller lakes withen 15 min's of minaki that produce great smallie fishing, if your up this way try catastrophe, sword and pelicanpouch lake you should be able to catch upwards of 100 smalles in a day lots in the 16 inch range good luck
